presets.name: Casual

presets.name: Intermediate
presets.flags: Onone Kmain Pshop Cstandard/j:abilities Twild Sstandard Bstandard/whyburn Etoggle Gdupe/mp/warp/life/sylph -spoon
presets.description: For players with a few seeds under their belt, these flags move past the Casual preset by emphasizing treasure hunting and introducing some core Free Enterprise concepts seen in common FF4FE Perfected play.

presets.name: Advanced

presets.description: Flags for players interested in exploring competitive FF4FE Perfected play.
